H0.text: What is the capital of the state of Oregon. Portland

H1.text: What is the capital of the state of Oregon. Eugene

H2.text: What is the capital of the state of Oregon. Bend

H3.text: What is the capital of the state of Oregon. Salem

A4.text: Salem is the capital city of the U.S. state of Oregon, and the county seat of Marion County.

A5.text: With the coming of statehood in 1859, it became the state capital.
